name: Using Fluorescence Spectroscopy To Assess Food Quality
details: Fluorescence spectroscopy is a well-established analytical technique that is increasingly been utilized to monitor food standards. This includes investigating different qualities of food such as tenderness.

name: You Have To Wash Your Hands For 20 Seconds To Keep Yourself Free
details: Washing hands with soap and water is the best way to get rid of germs in most situations. If soap and water are not readily available, you can use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% alcohol.
